message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $14,000. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I'm still not able to meet at $12,500. I'd like to stick to my initial budget of $11,000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
